description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国企业家，华为副董事长、轮值董事长、首席财务官。
description.en: Chinese business executive, serving as deputy chairwoman, rotating chairwoman, and CFO of Huawei.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，华为技术有限公司创始人兼总裁，孟晚舟的父亲。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, the founder and CEO of Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd., and the father of Meng Wanzhou.

description.zh-cn: 孟晚舟的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Meng Wanzhou.

description.zh-cn: 孟晚舟的胞弟。
description.en: Brother of Meng Wanzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆女歌手、演员，任正非的女儿，孟晚舟的异母妹妹。
description.en: Chinese singer and actress, daughter of Ren Zhengfei and half-sister of Meng Wanzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任四川省副省长，孟晚舟的外公。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the vice governor of Sichuan Province, and the maternal grandfather of Meng Wanzhou.

description.zh-cn: 孟晚舟的丈夫，香港晴福投资管理公司董事长。
description.en: Husband of Meng Wanzhou, chairman of Hong Kong Qingfu Investment Management Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中国跨国科技公司。
description.en: Chinese multinational technology corporation.

en: The High School Affiliated to Shenzhen University

description.zh-cn: 位于中国广东省深圳市的一所中学。
description.en: A high school located in Shenzhen, Guangdong, China.

en: Changzhou College of Finance and Economics

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江苏省常州市的一所财经类学校。
description.en: A finance and economics school located in Changzhou, Jiangsu, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国广东省深圳市的一所综合性大学。
description.en: A public university in Shenzhen, Guangdong, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国四大国有商业银行之一。
description.en: One of the 'big four' state-owned commercial banks in China.

en: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省武汉市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Wuhan, Hubei, China.

description.zh-cn: 指华为副董事长孟晚舟在加拿大被捕，并面临美国引渡要求的事件。
description.en: Refers to the arrest of Huawei's deputy chair Meng Wanzhou in Canada and the subsequent extradition request from the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国的联邦政府。
description.en: The federal government of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲国家。
description.en: A country in North America.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府的行政部门，负责执法和保障公共安全。
description.en: A federal executive department of the U.S. government, responsible for the enforcement of the law and administration of justice.

description.zh-cn: 美国律师和政治人物，曾任美国代理司法部长。
description.en: American lawyer and politician who served as the acting United States Attorney General.

description.zh-cn: 美国司法部与孟晚舟达成的法律协议，根据该协议，如果孟晚舟遵守特定条件，针对她的刑事指控将被推迟并最终可能被撤销。
description.en: A legal agreement between the U.S. Department of Justice and Meng Wanzhou, under which criminal charges against her were deferred and eventually dismissed upon her adherence to specified conditions.

en: Embassy of the People's Republic of China, Ottawa

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在加拿大的最高外交代表机构。
description.en: The People's Republic of China's diplomatic mission to Canada.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省省会。
description.en: The capital of Sichuan province in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 孟晚舟是任正非的长女。
description.en: Meng Wanzhou is the eldest daughter of Ren Zhengfei.

description.zh-cn: 孟晚舟是孟军的女儿。
description.en: Meng Wanzhou is the daughter of Meng Jun.

description.zh-cn: 任平是孟晚舟的胞弟。
description.en: Ren Ping is Meng Wanzhou's full brother.

description.zh-cn: 姚安娜是孟晚舟的异母妹妹。
description.en: Yao Anna is Meng Wanzhou's half-sister.

description.zh-cn: 姚安娜是任正非的女儿。
description.en: Yao Anna is the daughter of Ren Zhengfei.

description.zh-cn: 孟晚舟是孟东波的外孙女。
description.en: Meng Wanzhou is the maternal granddaughter of Meng Dongbo.

description.zh-cn: 1990年从深圳华明学校（现深圳大学附属中学）高中毕业。
description.en: Graduated from Shenzhen Huaming School (now The High School Affiliated to Shenzhen University) in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 据一种说法，孟晚舟于1993年从深圳大学会计系毕业。
description.en: According to one account, Meng Wanzhou graduated from the accounting department of Shenzhen University in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 大学毕业后曾在中国建设银行工作。
description.en: Worked at China Construction Bank after graduating from university.

position.zh-cn: 副董事长、轮值董事长、首席财务官
position.en: Deputy Chairwoman, Rotating Chairwoman, Chief Financial Officer

description.zh-cn: 因欺诈罪指控并通缉孟晚舟，要求加拿大将其逮捕并引渡。
description.en: Accused and issued a warrant for Meng Wanzhou on fraud charges, requesting Canada to arrest and extradite her.

description.zh-cn: 应美国司法互助要求逮捕并拘留孟晚舟。
description.en: Arrested and detained Meng Wanzhou at the request of the U.S. for judicial assistance.

description.zh-cn: 孟晚舟事件的核心是孟晚舟本人被逮捕和面临引渡程序。
description.en: The core of the Meng Wanzhou incident was her arrest and the extradition proceedings she faced.

description.zh-cn: 作为美国代理司法部长，宣布正式要求引渡孟晚舟。
description.en: As acting U.S. Attorney General, announced the formal request for the extradition of Meng Wanzhou.

description.zh-cn: 以23项罪名起诉华为公司。
description.en: Indicted Huawei on 23 criminal charges.

description.zh-cn: 美国司法部与孟晚舟达成了延期起诉协议。
description.en: The U.S. Department of Justice reached a deferred prosecution agreement with Meng Wanzhou.

description.zh-cn: 该协议的达成使得加拿大结束对孟晚舟的引渡程序，使其获释并返回中国。
description.en: The agreement led to Canada ending the extradition proceedings against Meng Wanzhou, allowing her to be released and return to China.

description.zh-cn: 在孟晚舟被拘留期间向其提供支持，孟晚舟获释后对此表示感谢。
description.en: Provided support to Meng Wanzhou during her detention, for which she expressed gratitude upon her release.

description.zh-cn: 在孟晚舟回国时发布微博表示欢迎，称其为自己的榜样。
description.en: Welcomed Meng Wanzhou's return to China with a Weibo post, calling her a role model.
